title: Ecommerce Website - Next JS and MongoDB
description: Full-Stack ecommerce website with user authentication. Users can create an account, add items to cart.
stack: NextJS, TypeScript, NodeJS, TypeScript, ExpressJS, MongoDB

title: Cineaste
description: Simple watchlist app where you can add movies/series to your watchlist.

title: Fotogram
description: A full stack Instagram look alike. Users can login, post photos, like and comment posts and can chat with other users.
stack: ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, WebSockets (socket.io), Cloudinary (for photo uploads)

title: dounts
description: Website made for a college competition, where I designed and built the website using plain HTML, CSS and JS.
